toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is a calculated field representing the estimated Per/Hour cost that it will take to perform this operation using the labor grade rate for each run type multipled by their respecive hours (Setup Hours, Run Hours and Machine Hours) as defined.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Budgeting Cost per Hour
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__rtindoper_cost__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__rtindoper__c.rstk__rtindoper_cost__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>(( rstk__rtindoper_sethours__c * rstk__rtindoper_setlabgrd__r.rstk__rtlabgrd_hrrate__c ) + ( rstk__rtindoper_runhours__c * rstk__rtindoper_runlabgrd__r.rstk__rtlabgrd_hrrate__c ) + ( rstk__rtindoper_runhours__c * rstk__rtindoper_runlabgrd__r.rstk__rtlabgrd_hrrate__c * rstk__rtindoper_rtwctr__r.rstk__rtwctr_dept__r.rstk__rtdept_ohdlabrate__c ) + ( rstk__rtindoper_sethours__c * rstk__rtindoper_setlabgrd__r.rstk__rtlabgrd_hrrate__c * rstk__rtindoper_rtwctr__r.rstk__rtwctr_dept__r.rstk__rtdept_ohdlabrate__c ) + ( rstk__rtindoper_runhours__c * rstk__rtindoper_runlabgrd__r.rstk__rtlabgrd_hrrate__c * rstk__rtindoper_rtwctr__r.rstk__rtwctr_dept__r.rstk__rtdept_ohdfrngrate__c ) + ( rstk__rtindoper_sethours__c * rstk__rtindoper_setlabgrd__r.rstk__rtlabgrd_hrrate__c * rstk__rtindoper_rtwctr__r.rstk__rtwctr_dept__r.rstk__rtdept_ohdfrngrate__c ) + ( rstk__rtindoper_machhr__c * rstk__rtindoper_rtmach__r.rstk__rtmach_ohdrate__c )) /( rstk__rtindoper_sethours__c + rstk__rtindoper_runhours__c + rstk__rtindoper_machhr__c )</formula> <formulaTreatBlanksAs>BlankAsZero</formulaTreatBlanksAs> <inlineHelpText>This is a calculated field representing the estimated Per/Hour cost that it will take to perform this operation using the labor grade rate for each run type multipled by their respecive hours (Setup Hours, Run Hours and Machine Hours) as defined.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Budgeting Cost per Hour</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>18</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>6</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Number</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>
